sentences.en: " The impulse of thy strength, only less free Than thou, 0 Uncontrollable! "
sentences.cn: 假如我分有你的脉搏, 仅仅不如你那么自由, 哦,无法约束的生命!

sentences.en: An uncontrollable tremor shook his mouth.
sentences.cn: 他的双唇控制不住地颤抖.

sentences.en: He burst into uncontrollable laughter at something I'd said.
sentences.cn: 听了我的话，他禁不住大笑起来。

sentences.en: I felt an uncontrollable urge to scream.
sentences.cn: 我感到一种控制不住想要尖叫的冲动。

sentences.en: I had an uncontrollable urge to laugh.
In a gust of uncontrollable anger he broke the picture in pieces.
sentences.cn: 一阵盛怒之下,他将画撕成碎片.
马克沉默寡言，难以管束。
母亲突然情不自禁地抽噎起来。

sentences.en: Occasionally his behavior became so uncontrollable that he had to be placed in a straitjacket.
sentences.cn: 他的行为偶尔会变得如此失控，不得不给他穿上约束服。

sentences.en: She under no circumstances disciplines her children and they are uncontrollable.
sentences.cn: 无论在什么情况下她从不惩戒自己的孩子,因而他们都变得无法无天.

sentences.en: The audience gave way to uncontrollable bursts of laughter.
sentences.cn: 听众忍不住发出一阵阵笑声.

sentences.en: The word " necessitated, " however, suggests that choices are fated and uncontrollable.
sentences.cn: 但 “ 必然会 ” 一词表示, 各项选择是注定的、无法控制的.

sentences.en: There was an uncontrollable note of fear in her voice.
sentences.cn: 她的声音中有一种控制不住的害怕.

sentences.en: Uncontrollable anger swept over Jim when he learned how Mary had been treated.
sentences.cn: 当吉姆知道了玛丽被如何对待时,一股抑制不住的愤怒涌上心头.

sentences.en: Uncontrollable children grow into young criminals.
sentences.cn: 任性放肆的孩子会变成年轻的罪犯。
我们不由自主地大笑起来.

sentences.en: William was seized with uncontrollable rage.

words.tran_cn: 无法控制的；无法管束的；难以驾驭的

trans.tran_cn: 无法控制的，难以驾驭的，无法管束的，不可控
trans.tran_en: if an emotion, desire, or physical action is uncontrollable, you cannot control it or stop yourself from feeling it or doing it
